data.title: Randall Stark Haynes
data.meta_description: Randall Stark Haynes is partner at Morris, Haynes specializing in product liability, railroad, trucking, consumer litigation and wrongful death cases.
data.meta_site_name: Alabama Personal Injury Lawyers | Morris Haynes Attorneys at Law
data.text:
Bio

Randy Haynes is a partner at Morris Haynes. Born October 23, 1956, Randy earned his Bachelor of Arts degree with honors in 1979 from Davidson College where he received a North Carolina Fellow Scholarship. In 1983, he received his Juris Doctorate from the University of Alabama Law School. While at Alabama, Mr. Haynes was named Outstanding First-Year Student and to the Order of the Barristers and was a member of the 1982 Alabama National Moot Court Team.

Since 1988, Mr. Haynes has served as Municipal Judge of Alexander City. In addition to the state bar, he is a member of the American Association for Justice, serving on the Presidentâ€™s Council, and the Alabama Association for Justice, serving as President from 2001-2002 and currently as a member of the Executive Committee. He is also the past President and Campaign Chairman for the Lake Martin Area United Way. Recently, he was inducted as a Fellow into the Alabama Law Foundation.
